programme.title: The Good Thief
Podwójny blef
The Good Thief
programme.desc:
The Good Thief: Directed by Neil Jordan. With Nutsa Kukhianidze, Ouassini Embarek, Tchéky Karyo, Marc Lavoine. An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0281820/","name":"The Good Thief","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NDUyNDM5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODEzNTk5._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0281820/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jotix100"},"dateCreated":"2003-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bob le Flambeur this is not!","reviewBody":"I have seen every film directed by Neil Jordan. Being a big fan of his, I didn't want to miss this one. Well, it was the big disappointment of my life. This remake of Bob le Flambeur is horribly directed and acted. The last sequence is just about the best thing of this film, but as for the rest, it was just mediocre, at best.

The idea of putting together these many characters in the Riviera was probably a great thought, but then, the many actors of different nationalities and backgrounds prove to be a hindrance to the story. If one can get over the accent problem, then there is the sound track of this film, which was so hard to hear at all, at least in the theater where I saw it, that you have a double hurdle to get over.

Nick Nolte with his hair dyed a carrot hue looks hideous; he probably was going through a bad period when he made this movie. His take on Bob is fitting with the character's spiral descent into hell because of his drug problem, no doubt. But he is also hard to understand since he whispers and mumbles most of the time. A little more clarity would have helped.

 The last moments of the film are very well executed, but as caper films go, this picture doesn't contribute anything to the genre.

 Sorry Mr. Jordan, better luck next time out. Maybe leave remakes to mediocre directors. You could not improve in the original one, so why even bother?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10352,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-02-28","keywords":"heist,casino,gambler,monte carlo,voyeur","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Good Thief","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi401801497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY0ZTNlZTItNWE5OS00NTZhLWExMzEtNGM2YThlYjBjZjY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY0ZTNlZTItNWE5OS00NTZhLWExMzEtNGM2YThlYjBjZjY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000560/","name":"Nick Nolte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0474333/","name":"Nutsa Kukhianidze"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001403/","name":"Neil Jordan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090341/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103900/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0494138/","name":"Auguste Le Breton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578483/","name":"Jean-Pierre Melville"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001403/","name":"Neil Jordan"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

Being a big fan of his, I didn't want to miss this one. Well, it was the big disappointment of my life. This remake of Bob le Flambeur is horribly directed and acted. The last sequence is just about the best thing of this film, but as for the rest, it was just mediocre, at best.

The idea of putting together these many characters in the Riviera was probably a great thought, but then, the many actors of different nationalities and backgrounds prove to be a hindrance to the story. If one can get over the accent problem, then there is the sound track of this film, which was so hard to hear at all, at least in the theater where I saw it, that you have a double hurdle to get over.

Nick Nolte with his hair dyed a carrot hue looks hideous; he probably was going through a bad period when he made this movie. His take on Bob is fitting with the character's spiral descent into hell because of his drug problem, no doubt. But he is also hard to understand since he whispers and mumbles most of the time. A little more clarity would have helped.

 The last moments of the film are very well executed, but as caper films go, this picture doesn't contribute anything to the genre.

 Sorry Mr. Jordan, better luck next time out. Maybe leave remakes to mediocre directors. You could not improve in the original one, so why even bother?","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10352,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-02-28","keywords":"heist,casino,gambler,monte carlo,voyeur","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Good Thief","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi401801497","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY0ZTNlZTItNWE5OS00NTZhLWExMzEtNGM2YThlYjBjZjY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY0ZTNlZTItNWE5OS00NTZhLWExMzEtNGM2YThlYjBjZjY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000560/","name":"Nick Nolte","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0474333/","name":"Nutsa Kukhianidze"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001403/","name":"Neil Jordan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090341/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103900/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0494138/","name":"Auguste Le Breton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578483/","name":"Jean-Pierre Melville","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001403/","name":"Neil Jordan"],"duration":"PT1H49M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Inside Man
Plan doskonały
Inside Man
programme.desc:
Inside Man: Directed by Spike Lee. With Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer. A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0454848/","name":"Inside Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjc4MjA2ZDgtOGY3YS00NDYzLTlmNTEtYWMxMzcwZjgzYWNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0454848/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shadowycat"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"High time the academy gives Spike Lee some respect!","reviewBody":"Whether I was into the subject or not, there's always a filmmaker at work in a Spike Lee film... he's one moviemaker who never loses sight of being a filmmaker first and foremost, and he's absolutely outdone himself with INSIDE MAN, a taut thriller which avoids the colloquialism that alienated mainstream audiences from some of his earlier work.

If you've seen the trailer or heard anything about this pic, you have been misled. Everything I heard left me feeling like yeah, OK, I'm going for Denzel. Denzel vs. Clive Owen will be interesting.

From the first shots and opening credits, you are submerged in artistic vision, and a finely honed piece of work the likes of which I haven't seen in years. I'd almost give this one a ten.. and I don't hand out tens freely. I do not want to spoil this. You have to walk in cold, and let this film grab you by the short and curlies.

This is one film where there isn't a spare frame or wasted cheap shot. Every zinger zings, and there are laughs too, laughs at merciful intervals to break the tension and remind an audience on the edges of its seats that movie-going's supposed to be entertaining, dammit. The cinematography is brilliant, and the music is fantastic - true cinematic score, true genius. I can't praise this one enough.

Christopher Plummer is superb, in what is (perhaps coincidentally) an ironic bit of casting. Jodie Foster rises to a challenging persona with aplomb and ease, and my only complaint of the entire exercise is that her character's name 'Madeline White' is perhaps a little cliché. Beyond that, there isn't a filmmaker alive who brings New York to the screen with anything approximating Spike Lee's vision.

It seems there hasn't been a lot of junket for this one, and that Spike Lee's presence has been downplayed... as if the studio downplayed the fact that this is a Spike Lee film slightly, until the word was out that this film is over and beyond what an audience might already expect from one of his films.

So... let me just say.. man o man this is a cinematic mind-blowing amazing one and a half hours... it's brilliant, tight, funny, articulate, intense, and high time the academy gives Spike Lee some respect.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":353578,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2006-06-28","keywords":"bank,bank robber,hostage,robber,negotiation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Inside Man","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi495889689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMwYjE0MDItYjA4Zi00NTMyLWI5NWItZDA2ZjQ5MWRhMzRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMwYjE0MDItYjA4Zi00NTMyLWI5NWItZDA2ZjQ5MWRhMzRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Inside Man"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654110/","name":"Clive Owen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000149/","name":"Jodie Foster"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000490/","name":"Spike Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1897957/","name":"Russell Gewirtz"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Forgotten
Życie, którego nie było
The Forgotten
programme.desc:
The Forgotten: Directed by Joseph Ruben. With Julianne Moore, Christopher Kovaleski, Matthew Pleszewicz, Anthony Edwards. After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0356618/","name":"The Forgotten","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwMjIyNjU4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjE3NjYyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0356618/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"suspiria10"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-30","inLanguage":"English","name":""I believe", Scully...","reviewBody":"Telly Paretta is seeing a shrink as therapy for losing her son in a plane crash, only she never had a son but is convinced she had. All the people in her life don't remember Sam including her husband. When she confronts the alcoholic fathers of another child from the flight they set out to discover the truth and the truth is "out there".

Part X-Files and part Lifetime movie of the week, "The Forgotten" seems to really channel Chris Carter's hit TV show, look it even has a redhead. The story is interesting and Julianne Moore's performance is sincere but you can't help but think that something is missing. The clever twist is good but they could have easily expanded the storyline and made it more "something".

Good but not great, "The Forgotten" seems to lack its own identity due to the derivative nature of the storyline which needed a bit of assistance from Fox Mulder.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":65041,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2004-12-08","keywords":"abduction,conspiracy,mother son relationship,children,therapy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Forgotten","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1626472729","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2NkMmU5YjctNWI2OC00M2ZjLWE3YTUtNmUxY2U0ZTg2MTM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2NkMmU5YjctNWI2OC00M2ZjLWE3YTUtNmUxY2U0ZTg2MTM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922035/","name":"Dominic West"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1468254/","name":"Christopher Kovaleski"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0747849/","name":"Joseph Ruben"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021095/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090778/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0224187/","name":"Gerald Di Pego"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dracula
Dracula
programme.desc:
Dracula: Directed by Francis Ford Coppola. With Gary Oldman, Winona Ryder, Anthony Hopkins, Keanu Reeves. The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0103874/","name":"Dracula","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjcyMDZlMTktYTIxOC00ZWFhLWJkYzgtNWNiYjAwYTFkNjIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0103874/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Treat For The Eyes And Ears","reviewBody":"As is the case with many of these latter-day horror movies, this is visually stunning. This one is particularly so, with beautiful colors, wild special effects, lavish sets and a handful of pretty women, led by Winona Ryder.

It isn't all beauty; there are some horrific, bloody moments in here. I've seen the film three times and the first two times was terrifying to me in parts. The last viewing wasn't as scary, but maybe I was distracted by seeing this on DVD for the first time, which enhanced the visuals and added some nice 5.1surround sound.

At two hours and 10 minutes, it's a bit long but there are very few lulls, if any. Gary Oldham gives his normal intense performance as Dracula and it never hurts to have Anthony Hopkins in the film. 

The only negative I found was Keannu Reeves, who sounds a bit wooden in his lines. Is it my imagination, or is he a terrible actor? Maybe it's just his voice. Nonetheless, Cary Elwes, Richard Grant, Sadie Frost and Bill Campbell all give good support to this film which is a real feast for the senses.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":202890,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"1992-11-13","keywords":"dracula,vampire,horror movie remake,monster sex,female vampire","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bram Stoker's Dracula","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3978142745","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGUxZTM4NzQtYjhiOS00ZDNkLWIyNmItMTMwMGM1NzcwNzY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGUxZTM4NzQtYjhiOS00ZDNkLWIyNmItMTMwMGM1NzcwNzY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bram Stoker's Dracula"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000198/","name":"Gary Oldman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000213/","name":"Winona Ryder"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000164/","name":"Anthony Hopkins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000338/","name":"Francis Ford Coppola"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020958/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053492/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0831290/","name":"Bram Stoker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0366337/","name":"James V. IMDb data; ttnr: 0103874, Title: Dracula, --- Description: Dracula: Directed by Francis Ford Coppola. With Gary Oldman, Winona Ryder, Anthony Hopkins, Keanu Reeves. The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0103874/","name":"Dracula","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjcyMDZlMTktYTIxOC00ZWFhLWJkYzgtNWNiYjAwYTFkNjIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0103874/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1","dateCreated":"2006-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Treat For The Eyes And Ears","reviewBody":"As is the case with many of these latter-day horror movies, this is visually stunning. This one is particularly so, with beautiful colors, wild special effects, lavish sets and a handful of pretty women, led by Winona Ryder.

It isn't all beauty; there are some horrific, bloody moments in here. I've seen the film three times and the first two times was terrifying to me in parts. The last viewing wasn't as scary, but maybe I was distracted by seeing this on DVD for the first time, which enhanced the visuals and added some nice 5.1surround sound.

At two hours and 10 minutes, it's a bit long but there are very few lulls, if any. Gary Oldham gives his normal intense performance as Dracula and it never hurts to have Anthony Hopkins in the film. 

The only negative I found was Keannu Reeves, who sounds a bit wooden in his lines. Is it my imagination, or is he a terrible actor? Maybe it's just his voice. Nonetheless, Cary Elwes, Richard Grant, Sadie Frost and Bill Campbell all give good support to this film which is a real feast for the senses.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":202890,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"1992-11-13","keywords":"dracula,vampire,horror movie remake,monster sex,female vampire","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bram Stoker's Dracula","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3978142745","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGUxZTM4NzQtYjhiOS00ZDNkLWIyNmItMTMwMGM1NzcwNzY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGUxZTM4NzQtYjhiOS00ZDNkLWIyNmItMTMwMGM1NzcwNzY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bram Stoker's Dracula","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000198/","name":"Gary Oldman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000213/","name":"Winona Ryder","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000164/","name":"Anthony Hopkins"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000338/","name":"Francis Ford Coppola"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020958/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053492/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0831290/","name":"Bram Stoker","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0366337/","name":"James V. Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Zombie Apocalypse: Directed by Nick Lyon. With Ving Rhames, Taryn Manning, Johnny Pacar, Gary Weeks. Months after a zombie plague has wiped out 90 percent of the American population, a small group of survivors fight their way cross-country to a rumored refuge on the island of Catalina." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1876547/","name":"Zombie Apocalypse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3MTEzNjgxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTQyNTA5Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Months after a zombie plague has wiped out 90 percent of the American population, a small group of survivors fight their way cross-country to a rumored refuge on the island of Catalina.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1876547/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"spacejoc"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Zombie Apocalypse? More like a writing, directing, and acting apocalypse!","reviewBody":"What can I say about this stinker? Yet another "SyFy Channel Original Movie" - otherwise known as a poorly produced steaming pile of schlock. It actually took two writers to come up with this garbage? It isn't even good for purely mocking purposes. Makeup people - when you feature a zombie in a fight, make sure you glue down their prosthetics! Computer animation effects team - you have to animate the rounds going into the gun, not just the empty shells exiting the breach . . . Ving, what happened to your career? Whew!\n\nHow is it remotely possible that SyFy can produce such great original series, but the absolute WORST movies? For good zombie fare, check out "The Walking Dead," where you actually care about the characters and the writing, direction and acting are solid. Don't waste your time - avoid this one at all costs!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5177,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Horror"],"datePublished":"2011-10-29","keywords":"explosion,zombie animal,dog,urination,severed head","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Zombie Apocalypse","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1979948569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWJhMGMyYTEtMGViNi00MDU0LWI0YjAtZWUzZTE4YjNjYWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWJhMGMyYTEtMGViNi00MDU0LWI0YjAtZWUzZTE4YjNjYWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Zombie Apocalypse"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000609/","name":"Ving Rhames"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543383/","name":"Taryn Manning"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1067251/","name":"Johnny Pacar"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0528963/","name":"Nick Lyon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042909/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4627875/","name":"Craig Engler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2399128/","name":"Brooks Peck"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

Christmas Icetastrophe: Directed by Jonathan Winfrey. With Victor Webster, Jennifer Spence, Richard Harmon, Tiera Skovbye. A meteorite brings ice and freezing temperatures, which threatens to harm the residents of a small town at Christmas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3993802/","name":"Christmas Icetastrophe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA4NTc4MzQzNDNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE2NzA4NjUx._V1_.jpg","description":"A meteorite brings ice and freezing temperatures, which threatens to harm the residents of a small town at Christmas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3993802/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"story_by_corey"},"dateCreated":"2014-12-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"If you are fascinated by things being flash frozen, you will like this movie","reviewBody":"In a nutshell.....asteroid hits town starting to celebrate Christmas, Santa gets flash frozen, people scream, people flee and good looking lead actor and actress save town just before everyone is flash frozen. 

Too bad Mystery Science Theater is not still on TV, because this movie is perfect for it. There is no story line, no character development, no acting of note, no anything other than wall-to-wall things/people being flash frozen. There is not even a point to who is/isn't flash frozen. But trying to find something positive to say, it does have a lot of actors who were in other shows/movies that were much better. 

Its just a classically bad sci-fi movie and the kind of movie for people who are into such things.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1369,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-12-20","keywords":"disaster film,meteorite,ice,small town,meteor","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005543/","name":"Victor Webster"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0817780/","name":"Jennifer Spence"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2113653/","name":"Richard Harmon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934912/","name":"Jonathan Winfrey"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0496864/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2579139/","name":"David Sanderson"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ba'al
Ba'al: Klątwa boga
Ba'al
programme.desc: Ba'al: Directed by Paul Ziller. With Jeremy London, Stefanie von Pfetten, Scott Hylands, David Lewis. A terminally ill archaeologist attempts to cure his cancer by retrieving the ancient amulets of the storm god Ba'al." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1122761/","name":"Ba'al","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NjY2MDkwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTI4MDk0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A terminally ill archaeologist attempts to cure his cancer by retrieving the ancient amulets of the storm god Ba'al.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1122761/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"friedman-8"},"dateCreated":"2008-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very funny... though unintentionally","reviewBody":"This is a ridiculously funny TV movie, though I doubt the producers planned it that way. The dialogue is stilted, the acting is wooden and the plot is completely nonsensical. However, it's really good for a laugh. Canadians will get a kick out of watching for the ridiculous Canadian goofs. (Like much on SciFi, this picture was produced in Canada -- Vancouver, natch.) Listen for the secondary characters with their Brampton accents... the Canada Post mailbox in the background... and my favourite, the US Navy Lieutenant with bars on his collar and corporal's stripes on his sleeve (reminds me of the MASH episode where Radar gets a "field promotion" to a Captain-Corporal). To make things even better, the rank chevrons point downward, a-la Commonwealth usage. Hell... you'd think someone in the crew would have noticed this?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-09-13","keywords":"disaster movie,disaster film,storm clouds gathering,airplane crash,death","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0518718/","name":"Jeremy London"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0902807/","name":"Stefanie von Pfetten"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0405111/","name":"Scott Hylands"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956484/","name":"Paul Ziller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086887/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0304021/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1321917/","name":"Andrew Black"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956484/","name":"Paul Ziller"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

A terminally ill archaeologist attempts to cure his cancer by retrieving the ancient amulets of the storm god Ba'al." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1122761/","name":"Ba'al","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NjY2MDkwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTI4MDk0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A terminally ill archaeologist attempts to cure his cancer by retrieving the ancient amulets of the storm god Ba'al.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1122761/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"friedman-8","dateCreated":"2008-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very funny... though unintentionally","reviewBody":"This is a ridiculously funny TV movie, though I doubt the producers planned it that way. The dialogue is stilted, the acting is wooden and the plot is completely nonsensical. However, it's really good for a laugh. Canadians will get a kick out of watching for the ridiculous Canadian goofs. (Like much on SciFi, this picture was produced in Canada -- Vancouver, natch.) Listen for the secondary characters with their Brampton accents... the Canada Post mailbox in the background... and my favourite, the US Navy Lieutenant with bars on his collar and corporal's stripes on his sleeve (reminds me of the MASH episode where Radar gets a "field promotion" to a Captain-Corporal). To make things even better, the rank chevrons point downward, a-la Commonwealth usage. Hell... you'd think someone in the crew would have noticed this?","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.6,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-09-13","keywords":"disaster movie,disaster film,storm clouds gathering,airplane crash,death","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0518718/","name":"Jeremy London","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0902807/","name":"Stefanie von Pfetten","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0405111/","name":"Scott Hylands"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956484/","name":"Paul Ziller"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086887/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0304021/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1321917/","name":"Andrew Black","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956484/","name":"Paul Ziller"],"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Freeheld
Tytuł do praw
Freeheld
programme.desc:
Freeheld: Directed by Peter Sollett. With Julianne Moore, Elliot Page, Michael Shannon, Steve Carell. New Jersey police lieutenant, Laurel Hester, and her registered domestic partner, Stacie Andree, both battle to secure Hester's pension benefits when she is diagnosed with terminal cancer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1658801/","name":"Freeheld","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzM5NTg3NjU1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzAwMjA3NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"New Jersey police lieutenant, Laurel Hester, and her registered domestic partner, Stacie Andree, both battle to secure Hester's pension benefits when she is diagnosed with terminal cancer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1658801/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Reno-Rangan"},"dateCreated":"2016-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not another lesbian romance, but a fight for the equal rights!","reviewBody":"Not long ago I saw 'Carol', thankfully it is not another that and better than that. It was based on the documentary short of the same name about a real life same sex couple who fought for the equal rights and the pension benefits, while one of them was treated for cancer. It is a great drama about fighting for justice than the romance as it states, but that part as well very impressive.

Ellen Page and Julianne Moore, both were awesome, except Moore was a bit old. By seeing them I felt being a lesbian is sweetest than straight, hetero and even gay. The first half was all about the relationship, but very decently narrated romance tale. And in the next half once Steve Carell enters the scene, the film diverted to another side of the story. All the actors were very good, including Michael Shannon.

Obviously the story was predictable and that is expected often in a biography. Because if they want to alter it, then they should pen a very cleverest script the audience never saw one like that before. I think telling a true story as it is is the point and that's what this filmmaker did. So don't complain about the storyline, just consider whether it is inspiring or worth a watch for other reasons.

For me it was almost a sentimental piece, but the second half story compromised and then I realised what this film was trying to say. Underrated film of the year for sure. Anytime I suggest it, especially for the grown ups and with a neutral mindset, because it is not all about the same sex romance, but the battle for equality in society.

8/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12249,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2016-02-10","keywords":"lesbian kiss,gay bar,partner,cancer,public hearing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3415913241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMDM5NzA5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTExMTUzNjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMDM5NzA5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTExMTUzNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A decorated New Jersey police detective, Laurel is diagnosed with cancer and wants to leave her hard earned pension to her domestic partner, Stacie. However the county officials, Freeholders, conspire to prevent Laurel from doing this. Hard-nosed detective Dane Wells, and activist Steven Goldstein, unite in Laurel and StacieÂ’s defense, rallying police officers and ordinary citizens to support their struggle for equality. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680983/","name":"Elliot Page"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136797/","name":"Steve Carell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0813164/","name":"Peter Sollett"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0118437/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0112971/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0518293/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0638913/","name":"Ron Nyswaner"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Good Thief
Podwójny blef
The Good Thief
programme.desc:
The Good Thief: Directed by Neil Jordan. With Nutsa Kukhianidze, Ouassini Embarek, Tchéky Karyo, Marc Lavoine. An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0281820/","name":"The Good Thief","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NDUyNDM5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODEzNTk5._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0281820/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jotix100"},"dateCreated":"2003-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bob le Flambeur this is not!","reviewBody":"I have seen every film directed by Neil Jordan. Being a big fan of his, I didn't want to miss this one. Well, it was the big disappointment of my life. This remake of Bob le Flambeur is horribly directed and acted. The last sequence is just about the best thing of this film, but as for the rest, it was just mediocre, at best.

The idea of putting together these many characters in the Riviera was probably a great thought, but then, the many actors of different nationalities and backgrounds prove to be a hindrance to the story. If one can get over the accent problem, then there is the sound track of this film, which was so hard to hear at all, at least in the theater where I saw it, that you have a double hurdle to get over.

Nick Nolte with his hair dyed a carrot hue looks hideous; he probably was going through a bad period when he made this movie. His take on Bob is fitting with the character's spiral descent into hell because of his drug problem, no doubt. But he is also hard to understand since he whispers and mumbles most of the time. A little more clarity would have helped.

 The last moments of the film are very well executed, but as caper films go, this picture doesn't contribute anything to the genre.

 Sorry Mr. Jordan, better luck next time out. Maybe leave remakes to mediocre directors. You could not improve in the original one, so why even bother?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10352,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-02-28","keywords":"heist,casino,gambler,monte carlo,voyeur","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Good Thief","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi401801497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY0ZTNlZTItNWE5OS00NTZhLWExMzEtNGM2YThlYjBjZjY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY0ZTNlZTItNWE5OS00NTZhLWExMzEtNGM2YThlYjBjZjY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000560/","name":"Nick Nolte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0474333/","name":"Nutsa Kukhianidze"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001403/","name":"Neil Jordan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090341/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103900/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0494138/","name":"Auguste Le Breton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578483/","name":"Jean-Pierre Melville"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001403/","name":"Neil Jordan"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: City of Ember
Miasto cienia
City of Ember
programme.desc: City of Ember: Directed by Gil Kenan. With Saoirse Ronan, David Ryall, Harry Treadaway, Mary Kay Place. For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0970411/","name":"City of Ember","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3MDE4MDU1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDM2NDI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0970411/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"regnarghost"},"dateCreated":"2009-02-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Flawed... but with enough of its own to separate it from the flock","reviewBody":"Had some trouble deciding my rating on this one. There is much about it to like, for sure, but there are also some flaws that cant be overlooked. It has great setting and atmosphere, an intriguing plot and charm to boot. Such things scores a lot with me. The directing is at times questionable though, there is little sense of pacing and there are some parts that feel tacked on (the crazy flumride anybody)just because its supposed to be a summerfranchie. The cute little girl is completely superfluous, and Bill Murray and Treadaway's Doon doesn't make enough with their characters (or isn't allowed too). One thing is clear. Its strenghs of this film mostly resides within the source material(witch i haven't read though). Its really nice for a change to see a fantasy film without a lot of monsters, the enemies here are brain-stagnation, greed and selfishness. Some parts had me snickering. The parts where they are handed there jobs through lottery (a jab at communism?)and the old man with the pipes. THe story is actually pretty good, not original, but tightly woven and deceivingly fresh with a timely message. In short, the source-material had the brains, but the director lacked the guts (or maybe just the talent, or were assasinated by his studio) too go through with it.\n\nStill, it beats the latest Narnia installment, and the latest Harry Potter too for that matter. Also, Ronan, the kid from Atonement, turns in a good performance.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":64180,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2009-03-25","keywords":"apocalypse,mayor,underground city,teen angst,unknown region","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"City of Ember: Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi543359001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MTg3MzY5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzc4NDk5MQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MTg3MzY5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzc4NDk5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing ... and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1519680/","name":"Saoirse Ronan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0429363/","name":"Toby Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1481493/","name":"Gil Kenan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073388/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003031/","name":"Caroline Thompson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2558309/","name":"Jeanne Duprau"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0970411, Title: City of Ember, --- Description: City of Ember: Directed by Gil Kenan. With Saoirse Ronan, David Ryall, Harry Treadaway, Mary Kay Place. For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0970411/","name":"City of Ember","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3MDE4MDU1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDM2NDI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0970411/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"regnarghost","dateCreated":"2009-02-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Flawed... but with enough of its own to separate it from the flock","reviewBody":"Had some trouble deciding my rating on this one. There is much about it to like, for sure, but there are also some flaws that cant be overlooked. It has great setting and atmosphere, an intriguing plot and charm to boot. Such things scores a lot with me. The directing is at times questionable though, there is little sense of pacing and there are some parts that feel tacked on (the crazy flumride anybody)just because its supposed to be a summerfranchie. The cute little girl is completely superfluous, and Bill Murray and Treadaway's Doon doesn't make enough with their characters (or isn't allowed too). One thing is clear. Its strenghs of this film mostly resides within the source material(witch i haven't read though). Its really nice for a change to see a fantasy film without a lot of monsters, the enemies here are brain-stagnation, greed and selfishness. Some parts had me snickering. The parts where they are handed there jobs through lottery (a jab at communism?)and the old man with the pipes. THe story is actually pretty good, not original, but tightly woven and deceivingly fresh with a timely message. In short, the source-material had the brains, but the director lacked the guts (or maybe just the talent, or were assasinated by his studio) too go through with it.\n\nStill, it beats the latest Narnia installment, and the latest Harry Potter too for that matter. Also, Ronan, the kid from Atonement, turns in a good performance.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":64180,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2009-03-25","keywords":"apocalypse,mayor,underground city,teen angst,unknown region","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"City of Ember: Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi543359001","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MTg3MzY5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzc4NDk5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MTg3MzY5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzc4NDk5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing ... and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker. Slumlord
programme.desc:
Slumlord: Directed by Victor Zarcoff. With Neville Archambault, Sean Carrigan, PJ McCabe, Brianne Moncrief. A newlywed couple, move into a new house across the country, only to find out that their marital issues are the least of their problems. Unbeknownst to them, their grim and lascivious landlord has been spying on them from day one." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4392454/","name":"Slumlord","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUzNDZkZTAtYzdmZi00NzI3LThkMjQtNTMxYWVjNmU4OGZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjEwNTM2Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A newlywed couple, move into a new house across the country, only to find out that their marital issues are the least of their problems. Unbeknownst to them, their grim and lascivious landlord has been spying on them from day one.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4392454/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hellhound8"},"dateCreated":"2016-08-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slightly better than a kick in the balls","reviewBody":"To say this movie is garbage would be an insult to garbage. I've watched pieces of rotting banana peels that have a more thought out plot and better written script. Every character in the movie has the IQ of a lobotomized turnip. The director was likely Kim Jong Un using an alias, who realized that unleashing this piece of crap on the world would cause more long term devastation than simply nuking us. 

If you're considering watching this, I recommend getting a large tub of ice cream, swallowing it as fast as possible, and enjoying the brain freeze instead. Your head will be better off.

... programme.desc:
MacGyver: Created by Lee David Zlotoff, Peter M. Lenkov, Paul Downs Colaizzo, Brett Mahoney. With Lucas Till, Tristin Mays, Justin Hires, Meredith Eaton. Young Angus "Mac" MacGyver works for a clandestine organization within the U.S. government, relying on his unconventional problem-solving skills to save lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1399045/","name":"MacGyver","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NzUzNmQtMWI2ZC00YzdlLWI5ZTgtMGM3MjJlZTgwYTVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTIzMzY2NDQ2._V1_.jpg","description":"Young Angus "Mac" MacGyver works for a clandestine organization within the U.S. government, relying on his unconventional problem-solving skills to save lives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1399045/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"csgollum"},"dateCreated":"2018-05-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not that bad!","reviewBody":"Most of the reviews here compare this version (inevitably) to the one starring Richard Dean Anderson. Now I've seen only a few episodes of the original and, although there are a few differences, the character itself hasn't changed much. It's like Smallville rather than Superman, a much younger version of the same character.

RDA's MacGyver was quiet and modest and mild-manner, but so is this one. He is as staunchly loyal to his friends as RDA's version. Granted, he frequently breaks the fourth wall, but that only makes the show more believable (at least, to me). Most of the actual 'macgyverings' too are almost equally surprising and awesome. This version does use more chemicals, but then there are more chemicals around us nowadays.

So, for all those comparing this version with the old, just relax and give in to the fun! This is entertainment, after all. My rating: 7 stars.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19200,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-09-23","keywords":"character name as series title,surname as series title,one word series title,2010s,reboot","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1395771/","name":"Lucas Till"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1159702/","name":"Tristin Mays"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2058713/","name":"Justin Hires"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314692/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0504531/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0957453/","name":"Lee David Zlotoff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006997/","name":"Peter M. programme.title: The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
programme.desc:
The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 6470478, Title: The Good Doctor, --- Description: The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello","dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
The Good Doctor
programme.desc:
The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 6470478, Title: The Good Doctor, --- Description: The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZjMWEwMGMtODdhMi00NGRkLTkwZTEtNmM4NjA3M2FlNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"oneabello","dateCreated":"2017-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's an amazing show","reviewBody":"RANT Alright, I saw some reviews talking about how this show doesn't portray autism correctly and that this was made by "leftist-whores" pardon my French. First of all, autism is on a spectrum. Everybody who has autism experiences it differently and acts differently. Second of all, there's no need to bring politics into this. I don't see how this program is leftist at all. There are no politicians in it, no controversial methods dealing with abortion etc, nothing about the LGBT or race or feminism. Nothing in this show is about politics so I don't see how it's leftist. Anyway, thirdly and lastly, please learn grammar first before trashing something. There's a difference between "your" and "you're".

Someone also said that disabled people shouldn't be shown as "superheroes". That is an insult to all amazing disabled people such as Hellen Keller and Stephen Hawking. The people who trashed this show are probably neurotypicals with no sympathy for those with setbacks, whether mental or physical.

END OF RANT

Now, I should stop my ranting and actually talk about the show. Shaun Murphy is a doctor with autism and savant syndrome. People with savant syndrome may have low IQ scores but can be "savants" or talented at something such as art, calculations, memory, etc. Shaun has an excellent memory which aids him when operating on patients. People doubt him at first, but are then amazed when he saves someone's life. This show is probably on par, more on less, with any other medical/hospital/etc show in terms of drama. I'm just glad that there's accurate autism representation on TV and that people with autism are not idiots who can't fend for themselves and need to be pitied and babied over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3400122137","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWE0NzE0ZGItZmI3Ni00NTg5LTg3YjEtYmRiZDkxOThlMTA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Good Doctor" Season 3 premieres September 23 on ABC."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Legend of Zorro
Maska Zorro
The Mask of Zorro
programme.desc:
The Legend of Zorro: Directed by Martin Campbell. With Alberto Reyes, Julio Oscar Mechoso, Gustavo Sánchez Parra, Adrian Alonso. Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0386140/","name":"The Legend of Zorro","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE1MjVmYTYtOGFjZi00NGM3LTg0ZTEtNWI4MGI3NmM1MTVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0386140/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"christian123"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not an Oscar quality film but it could make for a fun night at the movies","reviewBody":"Antonio Banderas is back under the mask of Zorro, the 19th Century swashbuckler who must face another dangerous mission, although he promised his wife Elena (Catherine Zeta-Jones) that he'd give up his life of adventure for a quiet family life as Alejandro de la Vega. But those who opposed California becoming a state in the Union are planning a new threat that might change their plans.

The Mask Of Zorro was a pretty good film. The sequel isn't as good yet it's still enjoyable. I personally would rather have the PG-13 rating but surprisingly the sequel didn't actually suck. I have to give credit to the cast and director. Martin Campbell knows how to direct action and he made this film very entertaining to watch. The story is a little weak and there isn't really anything new to found here but the action makes up for that.

The acting is solid just like the first one. Antonio Banderas takes the role of Zorro again and he does a good job. Catherine Zeta Jones returns as Elena and she also does a pretty good job. These two have a lot of chemistry together and they are interesting to watch on screen. The new addition to the cast and the person who almost ruined the film is Adrian Alonso. He plays Joaquin, the son of Zorro and Elena. He has a few funny lines but for the most part, he is really annoying. His role should have been cut since he almost ruined the entire movie.

Many people are complaining that the new rating kills the film and I disagree. The fight scenes are tamer and safer when compared to the original. He actually doesn't really use his sword to kill nor is much blood shown. However, the fight scenes are still pretty good and there are a lot of entertaining scenes like the train scene at the end. There were some boring scenes but they didn't last long. Also, the film is really cheesy and some of this does get annoying, nothing too major though. In the end, if you expect something like the original movie than you will end up disappointed. However, if you want something in the vein of National Treasure, a safe family action film, then this sequel is for you and it can really be enjoyed by adults too. Rating 6/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":96895,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-11-09","keywords":"abraham lincoln character,good versus evil,good man,good woman,four word title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Legend of Zorro","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4092920089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmMyZTUwNDMtZWQ2ZC00MjFhLWE5MzYtYTk3MDFlOTBiYTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmMyZTUwNDMtZWQ2ZC00MjFhLWE5MzYtYTk3MDFlOTBiYTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001876/","name":"Catherine Zeta-Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001722/","name":"Rufus Sewell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0132709/","name":"Martin Campbell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132178/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0649460/","name":"Roberto Orci"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0476064/","name":"Alex Kurtzman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254645/","name":"Ted Elliott"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="
